reportInterval.desc:: Set the amount of seconds between repeated notifications: default: 180

chatnotification.desc:: Set the chat notification type, one of these: PLAYER(closest player), EVERYONE(all players), NONE. default: PLAYER

highlightitems.desc:: Choose if leaking item entity should be glowing, default: true

reportThreshold.desc:: Set the min amount of stacked items being reported, default: 80

autoremovethreshold.desc:: Set the amount of stacked items being automatically removed, default: 120
